trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for design-time tools, not derived from <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner"></xref>, that provide smart tag or designer verb capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe base para as ferramentas de tempo de design, não é derivado de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner"> </xref>, que fornecem recursos de verbo do designer ou marca inteligente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> properties to query for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> collections, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>classe fornece a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>Propriedades para consultar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb>coleções, respectivamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: However, if a design-time tool author decides not to derive from this class, the DesignerCommandSet class represents an alternative base class to provide this functionality.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se um autor da ferramenta de tempo de design não decidir derivar dessa classe, a classe DesignerCommandSet representa uma classe base alternativa para fornecer essa funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerCommandSet class contains only three members, described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: A classe DesignerCommandSet contém apenas três membros, descritos na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |Public member|Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>|Returns the collection of either the smart tags or designer verbs associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: | Membro público | Descrição | |-------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>| Retorna a coleção de marcas inteligentes ou de verbos do designer associados ao componente projetado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>

trans-unit.source: The base implementation returns `null`.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.ActionLists%2A>|Gets the collection of all the smart tags associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a implementação base `null`. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.ActionLists%2A>| Obtém a coleção de todas as marcas inteligentes associadas ao componente projetado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The base implementation simply calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.Verbs%2A>|Gets the collection of all the designer verbs associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base simplesmente chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.Verbs%2A>| Obtém a coleção de todos os verbos do designer associado ao componente projetado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>

trans-unit.source: The base implementation simply calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>.| A DesignerCommandSet should be added as a site-specific service.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base simplesmente chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>. | Um DesignerCommandSet deve ser adicionado como um serviço específico do site.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>

trans-unit.source: Externally, a service of this type should first be queried to discover smart tag and designer verb functionality.
trans-unit.target: Externamente, um serviço desse tipo deve ser consultado primeiro para descobrir marca inteligente e funcionalidade de verbo do designer.

trans-unit.source: If this service is not found, then the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Se esse serviço não for encontrado, então o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade deve ser usada em vez disso.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This procedure provides a path for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Esse procedimento fornece um caminho para versões anteriores compatibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Because this base class contains no state, the default constructor does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Como essa classe de base contém sem estado, o construtor padrão não fará nada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all the smart tags associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de todas as marcas inteligentes associadas ao componente projetado.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation simply calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A> with the string parameter "ActionLists".
trans-unit.target: A implementação base simplesmente chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>com o parâmetro de cadeia de caracteres "ActionLists".</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that contains the smart tags for the associated designed component.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> que contém as marcas inteligentes para o componente projetado associado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of command objects.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de objetos de comando.

trans-unit.source: Although the base implementation always returns `null`, the overridden version supplied by the programmer should return a collection of command objects of the type described by `name`.
trans-unit.target: Embora a implementação base sempre retorna `null`, a versão substituída fornecida pelo programador deve retornar uma coleção de objetos de comando do tipo descrito pelo `name`.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.Verbs%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.ActionLists%2A> properties specify the following values and meanings for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.Verbs%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.ActionLists%2A>propriedades especificam os valores e os seguintes significados para esse parâmetro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: |String|Meaning| |------------|-------------| |"ActionLists"|Return a collection of all the smart tags associated with the component.| |"Verbs"|Return a collection of all the designer verbs associated with the component.|
trans-unit.target: | Cadeia de caracteres | Ou seja | |------------|-------------| |" ActionLists "| Retornar uma coleção de todas as marcas inteligentes associadas ao componente. | |" Verbos "| Retornar uma coleção de todos os verbos do designer associado ao componente. |

trans-unit.source: The type of collection to return, indicating either a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> or a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de coleção para retornar, indicando a um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> ou um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the specified type—either <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"></xref>—of command objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém o tipo especificado, ou <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb"> </xref>— de objetos de comando.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a implementação base sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all the designer verbs associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de todos os verbos do designer associado ao componente projetado.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation simply calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A> with the string parameter "Verbs".
trans-unit.target: A implementação base simplesmente chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>com o parâmetro de cadeia de caracteres "Verbos".</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"></xref> that contains the designer verbs for the associated designed component.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection"> </xref> que contém os verbos do designer para o componente projetado associado.
